main event: A group of lights was observed behaving erratically over Clovis, New Mexico.
interesting points: The lights appeared to be controlled and turned on and off in an erratic manner., They were observed at about 2000 feet below the ceiling of the weather., The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The lights moved with no visible trails or exhaust., No identification could be made of the lights as they disappeared from sight.
witness description: a person riding in a car at the time of the sighting
